content: MQS-RH Retrofit hinge Seismic retrofit hinge for attachment to threaded rod ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - ### FEATURES:Features Easy and fast installation with connection to the serrated Hilti strut Verification of proper installation torque with usage of breakaway bolt heads Design allows installation of lateral bracing on a rod with no pre-assembly of nuts or washers. Double pivoting connection allows for both flexible adjustment to various bracing angles and longitudinal or transverse orientation Applications Lateral seismic bracing for trapeze rod Available for rod sizes 3/8” and 1/2 Used with Hilti MQS-SP-L-1/2” ### TECHNICAL DATA: Technical Data | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2197349 - Retrofit Hinge MQS-RH-3/8 - Package Size 10 pc - 2197348 - Retrofit Hinge MQS-RH-1/2 - Package Size 10 pc
